meanings.sent1: She enjoys eulogizing her friends for their kindness.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, people were eulogizing the hero's bravery.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone kept eulogizing the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work eulogizes the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The teacher eulogized the student's hard work in front of the class.

meanings.definition: To speak or write in praise of.
meanings.sent1: He is eulogizing the author's talent in his speech.
meanings.sent2: The journalist eulogized the actor's performance in the article.
meanings.sent3: The children were eulogizing their favorite cartoon character all day.
meanings.sent4: Her poem eulogizes the strength of the human spirit.
meanings.sent5: The mayor eulogized the town's history during the event.
